He has served as a senior executive in several financial services firms, including American Express, where he pioneered the first universal prepaid product, the American Express Gift Cheque, which quickly grew to sales in excess of $300M. He also assisted Waste Management with the development of the companyâ€™s new Web 2.0 venture, Greenopolis, which focuses on incenting and rewarding consumer green behaviors.

While at ERG Group, a leading global smart card technology company, David added $150M in new revenue and played a critical role in ERGâ€™s successful turnaround. He co-founded an innovative sports loyalty company, Sports Loyalty Systems, whose clients included Major League Baseball teams. David also led the creation of Affinnova, a multimillion dollar innovative product development company.

David holds a Masters Degree from the Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy including graduate studies at MIT and Harvard Business School.
